# ABOUT THIS REPOSITORY
My goal here is to develop a process scheduler simulator **based on** an assignment proposed in a university course.  
<br><br>
The objective ***is not*** for the implementation to be identical to what is described in the “tarefa.pdf” file. I plan to extend the project beyond what is specified there, focusing instead on building something interesting that helps me learn new concepts and improve my skills.

### TECHNOLOGIES USED AND INFORMATION

| The language used is | [![Java](https://img.shields.io/badge/Java-white?style=flat&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%%2BPGc%%2BPHBhdGggZmlsbD0iIzE1NjVDMCIgZD0iTTM5LDM4LjYwNGMtNC4xNDYsNC4wOTUtMTQuNjU5LDUuNTg3LTI1LjIzMSwzLjA1N0MyNC4zNDEsNDYuMTY0LDM4Ljk1LDQzLjYyOCwzOSwzOC42MDR6Ii8%2BPC9nPjwvc3ZnPg%3D%3D&logoColor=dc524a&logoSize=auto&labelColor=white&color=%233a75b0)](https://www.java.com/) |
|-|-|
